description: Children saw a driver smash through a barrier - and drew it for police in west Germany.
title: Six-year-olds sketch rogue driver for German police
title_page: Six-year-olds sketch rogue driver for German police - BBC News
maintext: When the children - Luisa, Romy, Celina and Luis - reported the incident to their teacher she got them to sketch it and she then informed the police.
